title: My Experience with a DUAL System PC!
tags: how to build a gaming pc
description: Our first dual system PC build is finally complete!  But with the first system being used for gaming and rendering, actually finding uses for the second system wasn't easy.  But there's certainly potential!    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Phanteks Evolv X:   Z390 Taichi:   Z390 STRIX ITX:   NZXT Kraken X62:  NZXT Kraken X42:   MSI RTX 2080 Ti DUKE:   Enermax TR4 AIO:   Elgato Stream Deck Mini:    Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by the companies mentioned. This video is sponsored by Enermax & Corsair. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main 4K Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second 4K Camera -  $700 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------
